entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.2.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.2#fixed-in-202422

What's Changed

  • providers/oauth2: fix inconsistent sub value when setting via mapping (cherry-pick #8677) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8682
  • core: fix blueprint export (cherry-pick #8695) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8696
  • enterprise: fix read_only activating when no license is installed (cherry-pick #8697) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8698
  • website/docs: s3: fix environment variables (cherry-pick #8722) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8726
  • enterprise: force license usage update after change to license (cherry-pick #8723) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8725
  • root: fix container build (cherry-pick #8727) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8728
  • ci: fix missing DOCKER_USERNAME secret (cherry-pick #8730) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8733
  • providers/oauth2: fix offline_access requests when prompt doesn't include consent (cherry-pick #8731) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8732
  • website/docs: s3: fix migration docs (cherry-pick #8735) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8737
  • stages/authenticator_webauthn: fix error when enrolling new device (cherry-pick #8738) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8740
  • ci: fix missing output on composite action (cherry-pick #8741) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8742
  • web/admin: don't mark property mappings as required anywhere (cherry-pick #8752) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8755
  • web/admin: don't mark remaining property mappings as required (cherry-pick #8772) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8773
  • root: ensure consistent install_id (cherry-pick #8775) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8776
  • website/docs: installation: kubernetes: fix values (cherry-pick #8783) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8792
  • providers/oauth2: fix validation ordering (cherry-pick #8793) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8795
  • flows: fix mismatched redirect behaviour for invalid and valid flows (cherry-pick #8794) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8796

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.2.1...version/2024.2.2

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.2.3
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.2#fixed-in-202423

What's Changed

  • enterprise: only check for valid license existing for creating Enterprise objects (cherry-pick #8813) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8822
  • stages/email: Disable autoescape for text templates (cherry-pick #8812) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8824
  • stages/email: fix issue when sending emails to users with same display as email (cherry-pick #8850) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8852
  • tenants: really ensure default tenant cannot be deleted (cherry-pick #8875) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8876
  • api: capabilities: properly set can_save_media when s3 is enabled (cherry-pick #8896) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8897
  • enterprise/rac: fix connection token management (cherry-pick #8909) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8912
  • stages/user_write: ensure user data is json-serializable (cherry-pick #8926) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8928
  • events: discard notification if user has empty email (cherry-pick #8938) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8951
  • website/docs: config: remove options moved to tenants (cherry-pick #8976) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8977
  • lifecycle: migrate: ensure template schema exists before migrating (cherry-pick #8952) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9022

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.2.2...version/2024.2.3

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.4.1
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.4#fixed-in-202441

What's Changed

  • web: markdown: display markdown even when frontmatter is missing (cherry-pick #9404) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9405
  • sources/oauth: ensure all UI sources return a valid source (cherry-pick #9401) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9406
  • stages/identification: don't check source component (cherry-pick #9410) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9420
  • web: Add resolved and integrity fields back to package-lock.json (cherry-pick #9419) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9421
  • core: fix logic for token expiration (cherry-pick #9426) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9428
  • ci: fix ci pipeline (cherry-pick #9427) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9429
  • web/common: fix locale detection for user-set locale (cherry-pick #9436) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9439
  • lifecycle: always try custom redis URL (cherry-pick #9441) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9458
  • website/docs: prepare 2024.4.1 (cherry-pick #9459) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9461
  • web/admin: show user internal service account as disabled (cherry-pick #9464) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9467
  • web/admin: fix disabled button color with dark theme (cherry-pick #9465) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9468
  • sources/scim: fix service account user path (cherry-pick #9463) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9470
  • website/docs: update release notes for 2024.4.1 again (cherry-pick #9471) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9472

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.4.0...version/2024.4.1

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.4.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.4#fixed-in-202442

What's Changed

  • sources/oauth: fix OAuth Client sending token request incorrectly (cherry-pick #9474) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9475
  • flows: fix execute API endpoint (cherry-pick #9478) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9481
  • events: ensure all models' str can be called without any further lookups (cherry-pick #9480) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9485
  • web/flows: fix missing fallback for flow logo (cherry-pick #9487) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9492
  • core: only prefetch related objects when required (cherry-pick #9476) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9510
  • web: Add missing integrity hashes to package-lock.json by @jvanbruegge in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9527
  • lifecycle: close database connection after migrating (cherry-pick #9516) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9531
  • providers/saml: fix ecdsa support (cherry-pick #9537) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9544
  • web/flows: fix error when enrolling multiple WebAuthn devices consecutively (cherry-pick #9545) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9547
  • providers/scim: fix time_limit not set correctly (cherry-pick #9546) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9553
  • enterprise/audit: fix audit logging with m2m relations (cherry-pick #9571) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9572
  • core: fix source_flow_manager saving user-source connection too early (cherry-pick #9559) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9578
  • providers/scim: fix SCIM ID incorrectly used as primary key (cherry-pick #9557) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9579
  • tenants: fix scheduled tasks not running on default tenant (cherry-pick #9583) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9586
  • core: fix task clean_expiring_models removing valid sessions with using database storage (cherry-pick #9598) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9601
  • core: fix condition in task clean_expiring_models (cherry-pick #9603) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9604
  • sources/scim: fix duplicate groups and invalid schema (cherry-pick #9466) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9606
  • website/docs: prepare 2024.4.2 release notes (cherry-pick #9555) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9624

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.4.1...version/2024.4.2
